item.description:
Website: fireplacerest.com

The holidays have come and gone, Seasonal Affective Disorder has set in, and all you want to do is hibernate in bed. Sounds like you've got a case of the January Blahs! The remedy? Throw off your quilt and join us at this award-winning Washington Square favorite. Be in community with friends, and boost your sagging seratonin stores by loading up on hearty carb dishes like crispy corn waffles and Challah French toast. You'll be saying "So long!" to S.A.D. in no time!

* If you RSVP "YES" for this event, please be absolutely certain you are able to attend: a credit card was required to hold our reservation at this restaurant, and the group's attendance policy will be strictly enforced. (see RULES OF ENGAGEMENT below).

If it is less than twenty-four hours from the event and you are not
able to attend, you MUST call or text Tonya at (617) 445-7549.
An email from you to Tonya explaining your absence or less than
twenty-four hour RSVP change from YES to NO, is an expected
courtesy.

GETTING THERE:

MBTA: Green line; "C" train (Cleveland Circle); Stop: Washington Square.

DRIVING: There is a parking lot located behind the restaurant, off of Washington Street. There is also plenty of parking available on the street: diagonal parking along the center of Beacon Street, and parallel parking along Washington Street. (meters not in effect on Sundays)

*************************************************************
RULES OF ENGAGEMENT:

Please be considerate of your fellow foodies' time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES afterward and you have not attended, it will count as a NO-SHOW.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours, without an explanation, it will count as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, to those on the wait list, to the organizer, as well as the restaurant whose staff size is based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you're removed and have extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated, so rate the event by completing the survey afterward.
item.how_to_find_us: Barring blizzard conditions, we'll meet outside. If you're late, ask for the Brunch Meetup at the front door.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: January Blahs brunch at The Fireplace
